name: Product research / Финансовый аналитик
description:
Do you like numbers, spreadsheets, margins, strategic thinking, and analysis?

We are an Amazon e-commerce business, working with this industry for 10+ years, having a team of 18 people worldwide. We do not produce our own products and we do not do marketing. We work in a unique way, more similar to trading, different then many eCommerce companies. We organize processes, so we can make a profit by being more efficient in shipping, logistics, and timing to get the best market prices for our products.

Our business is of Research, Data mining, and understanding margins and returns. We thrive when our processes are followed to the letter and the work from everyone on the team is synchronized to produce lower costs, better purchasing decisions, and fast delivery of products.

Now we are hiring a new Research manager to join our friendly team.

Responsibilities will be:

  • Product research for Amazon business
  • Research of software management and automation
  • Analyzing products in stock and configuring re-pricing software strategies to compete in a marketplace environment
  • Analyzing the variable product accusation prices that will vary due to promotions stock availability of different suppliers and lead times
  • Reporting and discussing findings and strategies with the company’s CEO

*You don´t need to have experience in Amazon or product research, these skills will be taught to you. What you need is bellow :)

Our future research manager has these characteristics:

  • High English level (C1)
  • Important: You love and understand numbers
  • Have Proven analytical skills.
  • You are a quick learner of modern softwares and technologies. Experience with Excel, SQL, XML is a plus.
  • Higher education in Economics, IT or Engineering (could be other technical specialities)
  • Love to learn new skills and passionate about business processes

We offer:

  • Working hours are flexible, but mainly from 10:00-18:00
  • Full-time work with the contract, 100% remotely
  • Competitive salary depending on your results, starting at 750 USD
  • The high flexibility of working hours and flexible workload (KPIs)
  • Working with a team abroad (optional)
  • 24 days of paid vacation per year
  • Bonuses from your results
  • Friendly and positive team

We would appreciate if you start the cover letter with "I want to be a research guru of your company" and explain why you are the one.
